bug.author: brollb
bug.description: I suspect the plugins get detached from the branch when merging into it

comments.comment: I just thought I had replicated it but it was actually just forked and I hadn't realized it...

This is related to another feature that I would like to add at some point - reconnecting a job in deepforge w/ the running instance. That is, it already has enough information to be able to do this, it will just need to restart the management logic to apply updates to the given execution (specifically, ExecuteJob needs to be updated)
